EEPROM Emulation with Arduino API

dev board RobotDyn M0 Mini
firmware Arduino
features eeprom flash

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Arduino SAMD core
  • Arduino Flash storage for SAMD boards

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky Arduino M0

Buy the components

  1. RobotDyn SAMD21 M0 Mini

Code

Download code eeprom-emulation-samd21.ino

Makefile

Serial console

Serial output from the firmware.

Description

Read and write to the flash memory of a SAMD21 board (E.g. Arduino M0 or RobotDyn SAMD21 M0-Mini) with the EEPROM Arduino API.

The following APIs are used in the example:

  1. EEPROM.isValid()
  2. EEPROM.length()
  3. EEPROM.commit()
  4. EEPROM.write
  5. EEPROM.read

References

  1. RobotDyn SAMD21 M0-Mini a quick look
  2. Arduino Flash Storage library
  3. Emulating as EEPROM code example
  4. Arduino EEPROM Library
